name: Booze and Betrayal
description:
Booze and Betrayal is a short pixel platformer game with a 1920s mafia theme.

Make your way through four levels to avenge the death of your best friend, wrecking havoc along your path! Blood and Gore will line your trail towards justice!

  • Take down enemies execution style
  • Several weapons types
  • Fun characters and enemies
  • Cut-scenes
  • Blood and Gore
  • Fast paced gameplay

How to play:

  • move with keyboard arrows
  • shoot with space bar
  • change weapons with tab
  • go to menu with escape

Music credits:

(all music from Freesound.org)

  • Main Menu: Jazz Background Music Loop my Migfus20
  • Level 1: Funky Loop by Mvrasseli
  • Level 2: Game Background Loop by Yummie
  • Level 3: New York Jazz Loop by FoolBoyMedia
  • Level 4: Bass Loops 072 by Josefpres
